titles.title: Expressing condemnation for police brutality wherever in the world it occurs.
Expressing condemnation for police brutality wherever in the world it occurs.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution condemns police brutality around the world.
